## Third-Party Products

- IDEs (integrated development environments)
    - [VS Code](https://code.visualstudio.com)
        - Free, lightweight, massive extension ecosystem
    - [Cursor](https://cursor.com)
        - VS Code fork with native AI chat and code editing built-in
    - [Google Antigravity](https://antigravity.google/)
        - Cloud-based IDE with deep Gemini integration

- CLI (command line interface) tools
    - [Codex CLI](https://developers.openai.com/codex/cli)
        - OpenAI-powered terminal coding assistant; great for shell commands
    - [Claude Code CLI](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/overview)
        - Anthropic's agentic coding tool; excels at complex multi-file edits
    - [Gemini CLI](https://google-gemini.github.io/gemini-cli/)
        - Google's CLI with built-in web search grounding

- Other coding tools
    - [GitHub Copilot](https://github.com/features/copilot)
        - Coding agent from Microsoft/GitHub
    - [Replit](https://replit.com) 
        - AI-assisted app-development platform

- (Re)search tools
    - [Perplexity](https://perplexity.ai)
        - AI search engine with real-time sources and inline citations
    - [Consensus](https://consensus.app)
        - Searches only peer-reviewed academic papers; ideal for research
    - [OpenEvidence](https://openevidence.com)
        - Medical/clinical evidence search trained on clinical guidelines

- Agentic browsers
    - [OpenAI Atlas](https://openai.com/index/introducing-chatgpt-atlas/)
        - AI agent that autonomously navigates and interacts with websites
    - [Perplexity Comet](https://perplexity.ai/comet)
        - Browser with native AI search; summarizes pages as you browse
